mainBoard.flavorText: When Otarians learned not to trust wizards, the wizards learned to adapt.

Protection from Clerics
Morph o4oB (You may play this face down as a 2/2 creature for o3. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

rulings.text: Protection from clerics prevents damage from cleric sources, can’t have any clerics assigned to block it, and can’t be targeted by the abilities of clerics.

foreignData.name: Amulett der Gaunerei
foreignData.text: Bestimme eines Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält Flugfähigkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges; oder der Kreaturentyp einer Kreatur deiner Wahl wird zu einem Kreaturentyp, den du bestimmst; oder schaue dir die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek an und lege sie in beliebiger Reihenfolge zurück.

foreignData.name: Amuleto de artimaña
foreignData.text: Elige uno: La criatura objetivo gana la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno; o el tipo de la criatura objetivo es del tipo de criatura de tu elección hasta el final del turno; o mira 4 cartas de la parte superior de tu biblioteca, luego regrésalas en cualquier orden.

foreignData.name: Fétiche de tromperie
foreignData.text: Choisissez l'un La créature ciblée acquiert le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour ; ou bien le type de la créature ciblée devient le type de créature de votre choix jusqu'à la fin du tour ; ou bien regardez les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque, puis remettez-les dessus dans l'ordre de votre choix.

foreignData.name: Monile dell'Inganno
foreignData.text: Scegline una Una creatura bersaglio guadagna volare fino alla fine del turno; oppure il tipo di una creatura bersaglio diventa un tipo di creatura a tua scelta fino alla fine del turno; oppure guarda le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio, poi rimettile a posto nell'ordine che preferisci.

foreignData.name: Medalhão da Trapaça
foreignData.text: Escolha um A criatura alvo ganha a habilidade de voar até o final do turno; ou a criatura alvo torna-se do tipo de criatura de sua escolha até o final do turno; ou olhe os quatro cards do topo de seu grimório e depois coloque-os de volta em qualquer ordem.

mainBoard.name: Trickery Charm

foreignData.flavorText: « Certains rêves feraient mieux de ne jamais se réaliser. »

foreignData.flavorText: "Alcuni sogni non dovrebbero mai concretizzarsi".

foreignData.flavorText: "Alguns sonhos não deveriam se realizar."

foreignData.name: Gruppenzwang
foreignData.text: Bestimme einen Kreaturentyp. Falls du mehr Kreaturen dieses Kreaturentyps als jeder andere Spieler kontrollierst, erhältst du die Kontrolle über alle Kreaturen dieses Typs. (Dieser Effekt endet nicht am Ende des Zuges.)

foreignData.name: Presión de los iguales
foreignData.text: Elige un tipo de criatura. Si controlas más criaturas de ese tipo que cualquier otro jugador, ganas el control de todas las criaturas de ese tipo. (Este efecto no termina al final del turno.)

foreignData.name: Pression des pairs
foreignData.text: Choisissez un type de créature. Si vous contrôlez plus de créatures de ce type que chacun des autres joueurs, vous acquérez le contrôle de toutes les créatures de ce type. (Cet effet ne cesse pas à la fin du tour.)

foreignData.name: Influenza dei Coetanei
foreignData.text: Scegli un tipo di creatura. Se tu controlli più creature di quel tipo di qualsiasi altro giocatore, prendi il controllo di tutte le creature di quel tipo (questo effetto non termina alla fine del turno).

foreignData.name: Pressão Equivalente
foreignData.text: Escolha um tipo de criatura. Se você controlar mais criaturas daquele tipo que qualquer outro jogador, você ganha o controle de todas as criaturas daquele tipo. (Este efeito não cessa no final do turno.)

mainBoard.name: Peer Pressure
mainBoard.originalText: Choose a creature type. If you control more creatures of that type than any other player, you gain control of all creatures of that type. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mainBoard.text: Choose a creature type. If you control more creatures of that type than each other player, you gain control of all creatures of that type. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Eu não posso ouvi-los gritar, mas ao menos não preciso ouvi-los implorar." —Phage a Intocável
foreignData.name: Sufocamento
foreignData.text: Destrói a criatura alvo cujo custo de mana convertido seja 3 ou menos. Ela não pode ser regenerada.

mainBoard.name: Smother
mainBoard.originalText: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.

rulings.text: A creature’s converted mana cost is determined solely by the mana symbols printed in its upper right corner (unless that creature is copying something else; see below). If its mana cost includes {X}, X is considered to be 0. If it has no mana symbols in its upper right corner (because it’s an animated land, for example), its converted mana cost is 0. Ignore any alternative costs or additional costs (such as kicker) paid when the creature was cast.
A token has a converted mana cost of 0, unless it is copying something else.
If a creature is copying something else, its converted mana cost is the converted mana cost of whatever it’s copying.

mainBoard.text: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.

mainBoard.flavorText: It wasn't as much a strategy as a dim instinct to drown their prey.

foreignData.flavorText: Es war weniger eine Strategie als ein verborgener Instinkt, die Beute zu ertränken.
foreignData.name: Fressanfall
foreignData.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält -X/-X bis zum Ende des Zuges, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Zombies im Spiel ist.

foreignData.flavorText: No era tanto una estrategia como un instinto remoto para ahogar a su presa.

foreignData.flavorText: Noyer leur proie n'était pas tant une stratégie qu'un vestige d'instinct.

rulings.text: You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures.
Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.

mainBoard.text:

Destroy all creatures that share a creature type with the sacrificed creature. They can't be regenerated.
